name: Campfire Alert
description:
Controls 🎮:

A - Run Left
D - Run Right
W - Run Up
S - Run Down
ESC - Pause Menu

Description 💬:

Collect the Firewood and bring it to the Campfire to keep the flame alive.
But watch out! The Mages will try to steal your collected Firewood

Credits 💖:

Character Assets  Modular RPG Heroes Polyart
Enviroment Assets  Advanced Village Pack
BG Music Mega Game Music Collection by MuzStation Game Music
Fire SFX Action RPG

Sidenote 📌:

Project made for Ludum Dare 46
